name: Women's E-Commerce Clothing Reviews
data_intro: This dataset includes 23486 rows and 10 feature variables. Each row corresponds to a customer review, and includes the variables:

cat_feature_intro.Title: - **Title:** String variable for the title of the review.
cat_feature_intro.Review Text: - **Review Text:** String variable for the review body.
cat_feature_intro.Division Name: - **Division Name:** Categorical name of the product high level division.
cat_feature_intro.Department Name: - **Department Name:** Categorical name of the product department name.
cat_feature_intro.Class Name: - **Class Name:** Categorical name of the product class name.

num_feature_intro.Clothing ID: - **Clothing ID:** Integer Categorical variable that refers to the specific piece being reviewed.
num_feature_intro.Age: - **Age:** Positive Integer variable of the reviewers age.
num_feature_intro.Rating: - **Rating:** Positive Ordinal Integer variable for the product score granted by the customer from 1 Worst, to 5 Best.
num_feature_intro.Recommended IND: - **Recommended IND:** Binary variable stating where the customer recommends the    product where 1 is recommended, 0 is not recommended.
num_feature_intro.Positive Feedback Count: - **Positive Feedback Count:** Positive Integer documenting the number of other customers who found this review positive.
